title: owlcatz
author: owlcatz
content: https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/cash-app-releases-its-first-ever-bitcoin-focused-magazinehttps://www.cashbycashapp.com/product/bread-01-the-bitcoin-issue/160Looking for a copy or two - Only available physically released at these locations on/around 12/7:https://breadzine.com/stockists.htmlThanks!

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: December 09, 2023, 04:24:24 PMLast edit: December 09, 2023, 04:51:34 PM by tweetious
comments.body: Group buy anyone?In case someone is able to grab a few of those -from the physical locations - I am also interested in getting one. (obviously after owlcatz reserves their copy)Although the mag is free of charge, I am willing to pay some sats for their time & effort -obtaining them- +shipping

comments.body: I might be flying to Seattle first if the week, I know where that news stand is located there. Also got a friend in Miami . Will do my best. Will buy whatever they have.

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: I would love a GB for this as the minimum's 200-ish price tag is a bit out of my league...Isn't it an idea to contact one of the stockists? https://breadzine.com/stockists.htmlI've sent an email to the following stores:Casa MagazineDime's CafeLafayette Iconic MagazineLet's wait for their response maybe?

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: its the nature of the collectibles world - majority of buyers are in it only for the flip - buy it for $10 and sell it for $200 on eBay - might take a cheaper offer if one is given though.my guess is all locations got their inventory wiped out within the first day or two.

comments.author: montreal1
comments.body: I‚Äôm currently in one these cities so I spent all morning going around. I was hoping I could get a ton and send them to mopar or mj to distribute but it didn‚Äôt work out.1st store - had no idea what I was talking about and said they didn‚Äôt have them2nd store - I saw a stack of maybe 15 or so behind the counter. They had no idea what they were lol but called the manager and the manager said to give me one for free. I offered to pay for all of them or even just another one or two but they said no.3rd store - they had them in a basket by the door with a sign saying free, please take one. There were only 2 left but I grabbed one.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: So I walked about 7 miles today, went to every single location in Manhattan NYC and some locations had no idea what I was talking about. The locations that did have them were being very very strict and only allowing 1 per person. I feel that it's going to be hard to get some users on this forum multiple copies.Does anyone know how many copies were printed?I am going to try to go back to some of the locations in a different outfit and a hat and shades over the coming days to get more copies.Best,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Thanks for your efforts man, appreciate it! Yeah, no idea on how many or even if they are free or cost $, all I could find was those links myself... comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Update: I was able to secure 6 copies so far. The shops that have them are being insanely strict with the 1 per person limit. I am keeping one for myself and going to be setting up an auction for the 5 copies on this forum soon. Since the demand seems pretty high I think this would be the best way to give users on this forum a fair shot at obtaining one. The copies I obtained were free, but just know any sats spent on the auction will be going towards an engagement ring I have to purchase soon as I plan on proposing to my girlfriend in 2024. It was also kinda a bitch walking around NYC for hours in the rain today lol.Best,BTCOVERFIATS
